title: Sweet Spy
resume: Nam Sang-mi plays widowed police officer Lee Sun-ae who finds herself  suddenly immersed into international espionage by Han Yoo-il, an undercover agent. Kang-Jun has recently transferred to the Criminal  Investigation Department. He opens an old case involving Sun-ae's past  that leads him to an entanglement between the current political/economic  powers and their secrets. One of them, oddly enough, being Han Yoo-il.  Who is this man? Why is he here?
